headline: Warren Buffett Quashes BNSF-CSX Merger Rumors as Railroads Roll Out Coast-to-Coast Services
summary: Buffett met CSX CEO Joe Hinrichs on Aug. 3 to discuss more cooperation between the railroads, which are establishing routes linking Charlotte and Jacksonville to Southern California.

raw.headline: Warren Buffett Quashes BNSF-CSX Merger Rumors as Railroads Roll Out Coast-to-Coast Services
raw.summary: Buffett met CSX CEO Joe Hinrichs on Aug. 3 to discuss more cooperation between the railroads, which are establishing routes linking Charlotte and Jacksonville to Southern California.

headline: Buffett shoots down talk of Berkshire railroad merger, CSX shares slide
summary: (Reuters) -Billionaire investor Warren Buffett on Monday shut down speculation of a blockbuster railroad merger, saying his company Berkshire Hathaway is not looking to buy another train company.  Shares of CSX fell about 5% after Buffett told CNBC he was not interested in a merger, dousing investor hopes that Berkshire's rail unit BNSF would acquire the rival railroad operator.  A representative for Berkshire later confirmed Buffett's remarks.

headline: 3 Railroad Stocks to Watch From the Prospering Industry
summary: Shareholder-friendly initiatives and lower fuel prices bode well for the Zacks Transportation-Railroad industry. UNP, CP and CSX are well-poised to capitalize on the bullishness.

headline: Buffett: Berkshire will not bid for CSX or Norfolk Southern

headline: Are You Looking for a High-Growth Dividend Stock?
summary: Dividends are one of the best benefits to being a shareholder, but finding a great dividend stock is no easy task. Does Union Pacific (UNP) have what it takes? Let's find out.

headline: Union Pacific Working with Short Line Railroads to Expand Businesses’ Access to Rail
summary: OMAHA, Neb., August 25, 2025--Union Pacific Railroad announced today it has added 15 new Focus Sites across eight states to its network, with 12 of those sites located on short line railroads that will provide businesses ease of access to the railroad’s premier 32,000-mile rail network.

headline: The One Call That Could Define My Portfolio For The Next Decade
summary: I believe we're in a "higher for longer" inflation era, shaping my portfolio to capitalize on cyclical growth and beat the market with prudent, long-term investments.
